meanings.definition: A system for transmitting facsimile messages over telephone lines.
meanings.sent1: We sent the important document through telefaxes to the office.
meanings.sent2: The telefaxes machine at work is used to send and receive messages.
meanings.sent3: The telefaxes made it easy to quickly share the information with others.
meanings.sent4: The telefaxes connected us instantly, bridging the distance between us.
meanings.sent5: Using telefaxes, we can send copies of documents across long distances.

meanings.definition: To transmit a facsimile message using a telefax machine.
meanings.sent1: She telefaxes the contract to the client for their signature.
meanings.sent2: We will telefaxes the report to the head office tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: He telefaxes the sketches to his team, making collaboration easier.
meanings.sent4: Telefaxes the form to complete the registration process quickly.
meanings.sent5: Telefaxes the letter to ensure it reaches on time.
